title: Create a React Hook for Nx
description: Create a React component using Hooks in a dedicated React project.

examples.description: Generate a hook `my-hook` in the `mylib` library

path.description: Path where the hook will be generated.
path.x-prompt: Where should the hook be generated?

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the hook?

js.description: Generate JavaScript files rather than TypeScript files.

skipTests.description: When true, does not create `spec.ts` test files for the new hook.

directory.description: The directory at which to create the hook file. When `--nameAndDirectoryFormat=as-provided`, it will be relative to the current working directory. Otherwise, it will be relative to the project root.

nameAndDirectoryFormat.description: Whether to generate the component in the directory as provided, relative to the current working directory and ignoring the project (`as-provided`) or generate it using the project and directory relative to the workspace root (`derived`).

export.description: When true, the hook is exported from the project `index.ts` (if it exists).
export.x-prompt: Should this hook be exported in the project?
